description.value:
Special: Reliable

Note: Can be fired one handed with only -10 Penalty. Can fire on high-power mode: +1 Damage, consumes two ammo per shot Can fire on Overload mode: +2 Damage, +2 PEN, consumes four ammo per shot and becomes Unreliable (also loses Reliable)

system.notes:
Can be fired one handed with only -10 Penalty. Can fire on high-power mode: +1 Damage, consumes two ammo per shot
Can fire on Overload mode: +2 Damage, +2 PEN, consumes four ammo per shot and becomes Unreliable (also loses Reliable)
